warning.text: Are you sure you want to leave the site? You will lose all unsaved data.

goToProfile.buttonText: Go to your Culture Kid profile

hero.descriptionText: All children born in Helsinki after 2020 are invited to become Culture Kids. The kids are invited to two events each year until they start school. These events are free of charge.
hero.heading: Culture Kids

checkbox.label: I assure that the information I have provided is correct

required.label: This checkbox has to be ticked to continue

noupcomingevents.text: Event invitations sent to you will be displayed here. You can sign up for events and cancel your attendance if you, for some reason, are unable to attend.

notEligible.buttonText: Click here to find cultural events for your child!
notEligible.text: Your child is unfortunately not eligible for the Culture Kids programme due to their date of birth or hometown.
notEligible.title: We’re sorry.

hero.header: Welcome to the Culture Kids programme!

api.errorMessage: An error occured. Please try again later

heading.text: How can I take part in the activities?

kid.text: If the child lives in Helsinki and was born in 2020, you may sign them up to become a Culture Kid and register with the service.

ticket.text: You will receive an invitation via e-mail two times a year, and you can use the service to sign up for your preferred events.

theater.text: You can have fun experiencing culture, together with your child. The events are designed to support your child’s development and well-being.

registration.text: Start by entering the hometown and date of birth of the child you want to register. After this you will be able to login to the service and complete your child’s Culture Kid profile. This should only take a few minutes.

service.name: Kulttuurin kummilapset -palvelu
service.text: Contact us to find out more about the service.

godchild.name: Culture Kids activities for children born in 2020
godchild.text: Helsinki Philharmonic Orchestra acts as the sponsor for Culture Kids born in 2020. Contact us to find out more about the Culture Kids programme for children born in 2020.
